{"name": "Butler United Methodist Church - Loaves and Fishes Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We are open the last Saturday of each month
and the following Monday. Changes to the
schedule marked with asterisks ****

* January 27th and 29th
* March 23 & 25th ****
* April 27 & 29th
* May 18th & 20th ****
* June 29th and July 1st
* July 26th and 29th
* August 24 and 26th ****
* Sept 28th and 30th
* October 26th and 30th
* November 23 and 25th ****
* December 14th and 16th ****", "email": "", "url": "www.bumcnj.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "5 Bartholdi Avenue", "address_2": "", "city": "Butler", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07405", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.9995519, "longitude": -74.3400975}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 838-2026", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "23:00", "closes_at": "01:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Thrift Shop"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Will reschedule in case of holiday closures"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Toiletries, if available "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
